column4: is there chat software for LAN that works with windows and ubuntu, but i need something like P2P chat, do you know what i mean? So, if there are 30 employees, i don't want each employee add 29 userid..
Im not sure, but have u checked all the protocols that exist in Kopete?
does Kopete just IM Client? hmm.. do you mean jabber?
, I found some protocol  called group-wise , but I dont know if its what you want...
